elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Where are the following products disposed of correctly according to the Recycling Compass?

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Electrical and electronic devices
elements.correctAnswer: At the point of sale and/or the recycling center

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Paper
elements.correctAnswer: At street collections and/or the recycling center

elements.correctAnswer: At collection points and/or the recycling center

elements.title: Textiles and shoes
elements.correctAnswer: At collection points and/or street collections

elements.title: Glass
elements.correctAnswer: At collection points and/or the recycling center
